title: Best of the Program | Guest: Kari Lake | 8/8/22
description:
Glenn unpacks the "Inflation Reduction" bill and exposes how much it will hurt everyday Americans. Glenn and Stu play "What's Your Line," discussing various hot-button political issues, including the story of an elderly woman being banned from a YMCA pool after expressing discomfort over a biological man being in the women's locker room. Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake joins to lampoon the state of the country and explain what needs to be done to turn this country around. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
